name: B-Scribbles - Graffiti Software for PHP
short_description: BScribbles strives to improve any PHP webpage. Its transparent integration is painless to configure and install. Once in place, any visitor will be able to scribble (post) to a board using a simple, non obtrusive interface. Freely Provided under the GPL!
